thread.title: Here Are 8 Most Stylish Instagram Roundups Of The Week
thread.title_full: Here Are 8 Most Stylish Instagram Roundups Of The Week

author: Santu Misra
title: Here Are 8 Most Stylish Instagram Roundups Of The Week
text:
Style Guide By Santu Misra , Friday, 10 Feb 2017 
Even though daddy Shahid Kapoor won the week with this breaking-the-internet-worthy baby post, we at MensXP are all about equal opportunity, and hence stalked some of yours (and ours) fave Bollywood boys for some much-needed Inspo. From celebrities re-imagining ‘90s iconic tunes to dressing up as David Bowie—we’ve got it all covered for you. 
1. Fans were SHOOK when Harshvardhan Kapoor released some really hot photos of him and a definitive #MXPHottie—Jacqueline Fernandez—getting-it-on for a bridal magazine. © Instagram 
2. Varun Dhawan is most definitely selling his new movie a.k.a. a millennial take on Jab We Met-meets-DDLJ a.k.a Badrinath Ki Dulhania, really really well… © Instagram 
3. We are totally lovin’ Sooraj Pancholi for making a serious case for brooches here… © Instagram 
4. Brrr! Designer Manish Malhotra braving the sub-zero temperatures in New York © Instagram 
5. Jim Sarbh giving us major Bowie vibes in a sailor boy-apt outfit © Instagram 
6. Ouch! 
Ed note: We had to sit down for this one, but it just looks like a simple look test for a new role?! © Instagram 
7. Is Sushant Singh Rajput dreaming about a certain Jenner sister...? © Instagram 
8. Leave it to Ranveer to kill it with his #MondayMotivation posts! © Instagram
